title: Google\Cloud\SecurityCenter\V1\SecurityMarks
name: SecurityMarks
description:
User specified security marks that are attached to the parent Security Command Center resource. Security marks are scoped within a Security Command Center organization -- they can be modified and viewed by all users who have proper permissions on the organization.

Generated from protobuf message google.cloud.securitycenter.v1.SecurityMarks

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.name
params.description: The relative resource name of the SecurityMarks. See: https://cloud.google.com/apis/design/resource_names#relative_resource_name Examples: "organizations/{organization_id}/assets/{asset_id}/securityMarks" "organizations/{organization_id}/sources/{source_id}/findings/{finding_id}/securityMarks".

params.name: data.marks
params.description: Mutable user specified security marks belonging to the parent resource. Constraints are as follows: Keys and values are treated as case insensitive Keys must be between 1 - 256 characters (inclusive) Keys must be letters, numbers, underscores, or dashes Values have leading and trailing whitespace trimmed, remaining characters must be between 1 - 4096 characters (inclusive)

params.name: data.canonical_name
params.description: The canonical name of the marks.
